The Romance in Angkor package starts at $1,148 per couple and includes two nights in a private pool suite; two days of guided sightseeing in a vintage Jaguar; one in-room lunch or dinner; one breakfast or lunch at Srah Srang Traditional Khmer House, next to Angkor Wat; one spa session with a half-bottle of champagne; two-day temple pass; airport transfers; and taxes.

The Angkor Discovery special starts at $500 per couple and includes two nights in a junior suite; two days of guided tours in a tuk-tuk vehicle; one lunch or dinner at Templation Restaurant; a 60-minute massage for two; one breakfast or lunch at Sras Srang; a two-day temple pass; airport transfers; and taxes.
